name: Anthropic Chat Model
natural_language_description: 这是 Anthropic Chat Model 节点。主要用于: Language Model Anthropic

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one

model.name: model
model.description: The model. Choose from the list, or specify an ID. Learn more.
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The model. Choose from the list, or specify an ID. Learn more. | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': 'claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929', 'cachedResultName': 'Claude Sonnet 4.5'} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: maxTokensToSample (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion
temperature (值: None) - Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.
topK (值: None) - Used to remove "long tail" low probability responses. Defaults to -1, which disables it.
topP (值: None) - Controls diversity via nucleus sampling: 0.5 means half of all likelihood-weighted options are considered. We generally recommend altering this or temperature but not both.
thinking (值: None) - Whether to enable thinking mode for the model
thinkingBudget (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to use for thinking

output_contract.standardizer_logic: return { payload: { primary: upstream.content || upstream.text || upstream } }
